alert.note: Alert for Denali (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 27 at 6:01AM AKDT until March 28 at 6:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and freezing rain expected. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches and ice accumulations of one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting to 50 mph. * WHERE...Denali. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...South winds will taper off late this morning. There is a chance of freezing rain this morning and early this afternoon. Freezing rain is likely late this afternoon into this evening. Snow is likely tonight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
